ValidationRule.description: If the products field on the opportunity contains Profit Analytics and or Mission Control OR ERP = BC, this field is required to be filled out prior to being able to mark the opportunity as closed won.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'), RecordType.Name = 'New Business', OR( INCLUDES(Products__c, 'Profit Analytics - Enterprise'), INCLUDES(Products__c, 'Profit Analytics - Essentials'), INCLUDES(Products__c, 'Profit Analytics -Professional'), ISPICKVAL(ERP__c, 'BC') ), ISBLANK(Customer_IT_Champion_Email_Address__c), CloseDate >= DATE(2024, 7, 26) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This field is required to be filled out prior to being able to mark the opportunity as closed won.
